long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your online payment experience with Shaparak CAPTCHA Solver. This Chrome extension automates CAPTCHA entry on Shaparak payment gateways, speeding up transactions and improving accessibility for visually impaired users. Simplify payments with ease and inclusivity.
The extension works only on the shaparak.ir domain and does not access any other websites.
It does not save or share any data, ensuring your privacy and security.
The extension is open source. If you have concerns, you can check the code on GitHub, clone the repository, and install it manually.
GitHub Repository: https://github.com/bozorgiyan/shaparak-captcha-solver-extension
Supported Gateways:
 Beh Pardakhte Mellat
 Sadad
 Asan Pardakht
 Pardakht Electronic Saman Kish
 Pardakht Electronic Pasargad
 Pardakht Electronic Parsian
 Pardakht Electronic Sepehr
 Pardakht Novin Arian
